data.text: But Yahweh will act mercifully toward the Israeli people;
People of other nations will help them to return to their own land,
Some day Yahweh will free you Israeli people from suffering and trouble and from being afraid, and from being cruelly treated as slaves [MTY].
When that happens, you will make fun of the King of Babylon by saying this:
You evil ruler, Yahweh will get rid of your power,
You attacked people many times
But soon everything will be quiet and peaceful on the earth.
It will be as though even the trees in the forests will joyfully sing this song,
The dead people are [PRS] are eagerly waiting for you to come to the place where they are.
They will all shout to you together,
You were very proud and powerful,
You have disappeared from the earth like [MET] a star which has fallen from the sky;
You proudly said to yourself, ‘I will ascend to heaven, to my throne above God’s stars.
I will ascend above the clouds and become like the highest/greatest god!’
But you were not able to do that;
The other dead people there stare at you;
Is this the man who tried to cause the world to become a desert,
All the kings of the earth who have died were greatly honored when they were buried,
but your corpse will not be buried;
Your corpse will not be buried
People will say, ‘Slaughter this man’s children
This is what the Commander of the armies of angels says:
I will cause Babylon to be a place where owls live,
The Commander of the armies of angels has also solemnly promised this:
When the army of Assyria is in my land of Israel,
I have a plan for everyone on the earth,
I, the Commander of the armies of angels, have spoken,
I received this message from Yahweh during the year that King Ahaz died:
You people of Philistia, do not rejoice that the enemy army [MET] that attacked you has been defeated
Those of my people who are very poor will take care of their flocks of sheep,
So, you people of Philistia, wail at the gates of your cities!
If messengers from Philistia come to us Israeli people,
